thread.section_title: Dolphin Suites - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 3 weeks holiday
thread.title_full: 3 weeks holiday - Review of Dolphin Suites, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: fmkara
title: 3 weeks holiday
text:
it was our first stay in this hotel.the location and the views are great. the staff were excellent, went out of their way to please us. every issues we had were addressed promptly.remembering this is a 3 star hotel all the amenities were provided eg swimming pool, gym,sauna, steam room and massaging service.breakfast was inclusive and was very good the servers like lilian and co were brilliant however the food was pricey-VAT and service charges are added on top.as you are in tropical country you appreciate the nature the hotel is surrounded by fruit trees and all sorts of wild birds.pls note on check out you settle in dollars.the rooms are reasonable in size and kept clean by joan and co.we suggested to the management that the curtains need a backing to create a black out.generally kampala hotels are all very expensive this was reasonable.thank you Jeevan and staff for looking after us.
Room Tip: best views top floor See more room tips
